1{-# LANGUAGE PatternSynonyms #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Decode term name.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Term
7  ( -- * Term name
8    treeFlatName,
9    treesFlatNames,
10    treesTerms,
11    treesTerms1,
12  ) where
13
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                  as B
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                as S
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Content.Message  as Msg
17
18import Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.TTree.Pattern
19
20
21-- ----------------------  Term
22
23-- | Read flat term name from token tree.
24--   If the token tree contains nested term name, this function failed.
25--
26--   >>> S.tt1 "/a" >>= treeFlatName
27--   Right "a"
28--
29--   >>> S.tt1 "+/a" >>= treeFlatName
30--   Right "a"
31--
32--   >>> S.tt1 "/a/x" >>= treeFlatName
33--   Left ...
34--
35treeFlatName :: S.TTree -> B.Ab S.TermName
36treeFlatName (L (S.TTermN _ _ n))  = Right n
37--treeFlatName (L (S.TTerm _ _ [n])) = Right n
38treeFlatName (L t)                 = Msg.reqFlatName t
39treeFlatName _                     = Msg.reqTermName
40
41-- | Read flat term names.
42--
43--   >>> S.tt "/a /b" >>= treesFlatNames
44--   Right ["a","b"]
45--
46treesFlatNames :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [S.TermName]
47treesFlatNames = mapM treeFlatName
48
49-- | Read list of named token trees from token trees.
50--
51--   >>> S.tt "/a 'A3 /b 10" >>= treesTerms
52--   Right [("a", [TreeL ...]),
53--          ("b", [TreeL ...])]
54--
55treesTerms :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [S.NamedTrees]
56treesTerms = name where
57    name [] = Right []
58    name (x : xs) = do let (c, xs2) = cont xs
59                       n    <- treeFlatName x
60                       xs2' <- name xs2
61                       Right $ (n, c) : xs2'
62
63    cont :: [S.TTree] -> ([S.TTree], [S.TTree])
64    cont xs@(x : _) | isTermLeaf x  = ([], xs)
65    cont []                         = ([], [])
66    cont (x : xs)                   = B.consFst x $ cont xs
67
68    isTermLeaf (L (S.TTermN _ _ _))             = True
69    isTermLeaf (L (S.TTerm _ S.TermTypePath _)) = True
70    isTermLeaf _                                = False
71
72-- | Read list of named token trees from token trees.
73--   This function wraps long branches into group.
74treesTerms1 :: [S.TTree] -> B.Ab [S.NamedTree]
75treesTerms1 xs = do xs' <- treesTerms xs
76                    Right $ B.mapSndTo S.ttreeGroup xs'
